ComicInfo.Summary:
It's party time Aztec style! And that means things are going to get messy! The San Diego social event of the year is here and the world will never be the same. Robyn's new boyfriend is the master of ceremonies and is going to make it rain blood on the city by the sea. And Marian makes a desperate move to free Sam from the grip of a horror beyond the stars. It's all building toward the wildest climax you'll see this year!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Sean Chen & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Anthony Spay & Grostieta | 2 | C | Cover C | Kevin McCoy & Ula Mos | 3 | D | Cover D | Julius Abrera & Hedwin Zaldivar | 4 | E | Cosplay Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Dawn McTeigue (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | F | Denver Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | G | Licensing Expo Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Keith Garvey | Missing | H | Licensing Expo Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Keith Garvey | Missing |
